text: Tangaki Taulupe "Toby" Faletau (born 12 November 1990) is a Welsh rugby union player. He plays as a back row forward. He has played over sixty times for Wales since 2011. For club, he played for Cross Keys RFC and Newport RFC before joining the Newport Gwent Dragons. He has played for Bath Rugby since 2016. Faletau was born in Tofoa, Tonga. His father is Tongan international Kuli Faletau. He grew up in Pontypool, Wales. ==References== ==Other websites== * Welsh Rugby Union profile Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Oceanic sportspeople Category:Tongan people Category:Welsh rugby union players
title: Taulupe Faletau
